item.title: 标准普尔全球公司因分析产品需求而上调年度利润预期
item.description: 金融信息公司 S&P Global 周二上调了全年盈利预期，并公布第二季度调整后盈利增长 30%，主要得益于数据和分析产品的强劲需求。【原文：Financial information company S&P Global raised its full-year profit forecast on Tuesday and reported second-quarter adjusted earnings that rose 30% on the back of strong demand for its data and analytics products.】

item.title: 意大利布雷博在艰难市场中保持稳定利润率，股价上涨
item.description: 尽管汽车行业前景暗淡，但布雷博周二公布的上半年核心盈利和收入仍有小幅增长，从而提振了这家意大利高级制动器制造商的股价。【原文：Brembo posted moderate gains in first-half core earnings and revenue on Tuesday despite a darker outlook for the automotive sector, boosting shares in the Italian premium brake maker.】

item.title: 由于美国需求下滑和压榨利润降低，ADM 盈利不及预期
item.description: 受大豆压榨利润下降和美国农作物需求减弱的影响，全球谷物商 Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司周二公布的第二季度利润不及华尔街预期。【原文：Global grains merchant Archer-Daniels-Midland Co missed Wall Street expectations for second-quarter profit on Tuesday, hit by lower soy crush margins and waning demand for U.S. crops.】

item.title: 宝马将新建五个高压电池组装厂
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马公司周二表示，该公司计划在三大洲新建五个装配基地，以生产第六代高压电池。【原文：BMW plans to set up five new assembly sites on three continents to build its sixth-generation high-voltage batteries, the German carmaker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴菲特出售的美国银行股票超过 30 亿美元
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）出售了更多的美国银行股票，本月销售额增至 30 多亿美元，在这家美国第二大银行股价大幅上涨后获利了结。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway sold more Bank of America shares, boosting sales to more than $3 billion this month, taking profits after a big run-up in the second-largest U.S. bank's stock price.】

item.title: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场公司（Pershing Square）希望在首次公开募股中筹集多达 20 亿美元的资金
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的基金潘兴广场（Pershing Square）周二表示，它正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集最多 20 亿美元。【原文：Bill Ackman's fund Pershing Square said on Tuesday it was looking to raise up to $2 billion in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 普拉达上半年营业利润增长 17%，亚洲和欧洲销售额大增
item.description: 普拉达（Prada）周二公布的调整后营业利润增长了 17.1%，原因是该意大利奢侈品集团在亚洲和欧洲的销售额实现了两位数的增长。【原文：Prada posted a 17.1% increase in adjusted operating profit on Tuesday as the Italian luxury group saw double-digit sales growth in Asia and Europe.】

item.title: 法拉利加强与意大利税务部门的合作以确保透明度
item.description: 法拉利周二表示，其荷兰母公司 Ferrari N.V. 已通过加入一项合规计划加强了与意大利税务部门的联系，该计划包括旨在预防潜在税务纠纷的定期和预防性检查。【原文：Ferrari said on Tuesday its Dutch parent company Ferrari N.V. has strengthened ties with the Italian tax authority by joining a compliance programme that includes regular and preemptive checks aimed at preventing potential tax disputes.】

item.title: CenterPoint Energy 预计飓风贝里尔过后的恢复成本高达 13 亿美元
item.description: 电力和天然气公用事业公司 CenterPoint Energy 周二表示，预计恢复受飓风贝里尔破坏的设施的总成本将在 12 亿至 13 亿美元之间。【原文：Electric and gas utility CenterPoint Energy said on Tuesday it expects total costs to restore facilities damaged by Hurricane Beryl to be in the range of $1.2 billion to $1.3 billion.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空意外盈利，推迟购买价值 30 亿美元的空客飞机
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）公布的第二季度利润出人意料，并推迟了购买价值约 30 亿美元的空中客车飞机的计划，旨在通过削减成本实现盈利，使其股价在周二收盘前上涨了 6%。【原文：JetBlue Airways posted a surprise second-quarter profit and delayed plans to buy Airbus planes worth about $3 billion, aiming for profitability through cost-cuts, sending its shares up 6% before the bell on Tuesday.】

item.title: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 与 Anthropic 的合作关系在英国接受调查
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周二表示，正在调查谷歌母公司 Alphabet 与人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 的合作关系及其对竞争的影响。【原文：Britain's competition regulator is investigating Google-parent Alphabet's partnership with AI startup Anthropic and its impact on competition, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人工智能机器人说脏话，OnlyFans 明星就不必说了
item.description: OnlyFans 是一个色情泛滥的网站，它为用户提供了与内容创作者建立 "真实关系 "的机会。【原文：OnlyFans is a porn-saturated website that offers its subscribers a chance to forge “authentic relationships” with content creators.】

item.title: 支出增长，利润率提高，PayPal 上调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: PayPal 周二第二次上调了全年调整后利润预期，押注返校季和即将到来的假日购物季消费者支出的弹性，同时削减成本的措施提高了利润率。【原文：PayPal on Tuesday raised its forecast for full-year adjusted profit for the second time, betting on resilient consumer spending in the back-to-school and upcoming holiday shopping seasons, while cost-cutting measures improved margins.】

item.title: 债券投资者认为美联储 "鸽派按兵不动"，收益率曲线陡峭化堆积如山
item.description: 债券投资者预计美联储本周将维持利率稳定，但会发出即将降息的信号，因此押注美国国债收益率曲线将减少倒挂，最终恢复正常的正斜率。【原文：Bond investors, expecting the Federal Reserve to hold interest rates steady this week but signal that rate cuts are imminent, are betting that the U.S. Treasury yield curve will become less inverted and eventually return to a normal positive slope.】

item.title: 宝洁公司因需求放缓销售额不及预期
item.description: 本周二，宝洁公司第四季度销售额未达华尔街预期，原因是美国和欧洲注重价格的消费者削减了开支，导致其美容和家庭护理产品的增长放缓。【原文：Procter & Gamble missed Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter sales on Tuesday, as a cutback in spending by price-conscious consumers in the U.S. and Europe led to slower growth for its beauty and home care products.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空和夏威夷航空在反垄断审查中延长交易审查期
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团（Alaska Air Group）在周二提交的一份文件中表示，在美国司法部的反垄断审查下，该公司已同意延长19亿美元收购竞争对手夏威夷航空（Hawaiian Airlines）的审查期。【原文：Alaska Air Group has agreed to extend the review period for the proposed $1.9 billion acquisition of rival Hawaiian Airlines amid antitrust scrutiny from the U.S. Department of Justice, the carrier said in a filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 在收到报告后瘫痪 达美航空将就 IT 故障寻求赔偿
item.description: 周二，CrowdStrike 的股价在盘前交易中下跌超过 4%，此前有报道称达美航空（Delta Air Lines）将就最近导致包括航空公司在内的行业瘫痪的全球 IT 故障向这家网络安全公司索赔。【原文：Shares of CrowdStrike fell more than 4% in premarket trading on Tuesday after a report Delta Air Lines will seek compensation from the cybersecurity firm over the recent global IT outage that crippled industries including airlines.】

item.title: BioNTech 的抗癌药物在第二阶段试验中达到主要终点
item.description: COVID-19疫苗生产商德国BioNTech公司周二表示，其候选抗癌药物BNT111在一项二期试验中显示，晚期黑色素瘤患者的应答率明显提高。【原文：COVID-19 vaccine maker BioNTech's cancer drug candidate BNT111 showed significant improvement in the response rate in patients with advanced melanoma during a Phase 2 trial, the German company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 辉瑞上调年度利润预期，因 COVID 销售好于预期
item.description: 美国制药商辉瑞公司周二上调了年度利润预期，此前其 COVID 疫苗和抗病毒疗法的销售额好于预期。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Pfizer raised its annual profit forecast on Tuesday after posting better-than-expected sales for its COVID vaccine and antiviral treatment.】

item.title: 默克下调年度利润预期
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co）周二下调了全年盈利预期，主要原因是收购眼科药物开发商 EyeBio 产生了一次性费用。【原文：Merck & Co on Tuesday cut its full-year earnings forecast mainly due to one-time charges from its acquisition of eye-focused drug developer EyeBio.】

item.title: 全球冲突刺激武器需求，莱多斯公司上调 2024 年利润目标
item.description: 防务承包商莱多斯公司（Leidos）周二上调了年度盈利预期，原因是全球武器需求强劲，而且在地缘政治局势日益紧张的情况下增加了防务开支。【原文：Defense contractor Leidos raised its annual profit forecast on Tuesday, banking on strong worldwide weapons demand and increased defense spending amid growing geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 大型科技公司业绩和美联储决议渐行渐近，期指走势低迷
item.description: 由于投资者希望从本周美联储的货币政策决定中获得有关降息时机的线索，同时在当天的大型科技公司财报和就业数据公布前谨慎情绪逐渐升温，周二美国股指期货走高。【原文：U.S. index futures edged up on Tuesday, as investors hoped for clues on the timing of interest-rate cuts from this week's Federal Reserve monetary policy decision, while caution crept in ahead of the day's Big Tech earnings and jobs data.】

item.title: 对冲基金大规模撤出日元空头头寸，瑞银称
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）周二看到的一份瑞银集团（UBS）给客户的说明称，在日元兑美元汇率过去两周强劲上涨期间，全球对冲基金从看跌日元的押注中大举撤退。【原文：Global hedge funds made a massive retreat from their bearish bets on the Japanese yen during the currency's strong rise against the U.S. dollar over the last two weeks, a UBS note to clients seen by Reuters on Tuesday said.】

item.title: 早间竞标：微软和职位空缺将影响美联储前守夜活动
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: Meta 第二季度广告销售额有望增长；重点关注人工智能路线图和成本问题
item.description: Meta Platforms 预计季度收入将增长 20%，这主要得益于奥运会和多个国家大选带来的强劲广告销售。【原文：Meta Platforms is expected to report a 20% rise in quarterly revenue, helped by strong ad sales driven by the Olympics and elections in several countries, but investors will want to see if its spending on AI is starting to yield returns.】

item.title: 日本双日收购美国寿司企业，推动海鲜业务扩张
item.description: 日本贸易公司双日（Sojitz）周二表示，该公司已经收购了美国寿司大道公司（Sushi Avenue Inc）的外卖寿司业务，收购金额未披露，这是该公司扩大海鲜业务的举措之一。【原文：Japanese trading house Sojitz said on Tuesday it had bought the takeout sushi businesses of Sushi Avenue Inc in the United States for an undisclosed sum, as part of a drive to expand its seafood operations.】

item.title: 货运初创企业 Sennder 希望通过收购美国竞争对手的部分股权实现收入翻番
item.description: 德国数字货运公司 Sennder 周二表示，已同意收购其美国竞争对手 C.H. Robinson 在欧洲的物流业务，这笔交易将使其收入翻番，达到 14 亿欧元（15 亿美元）。【原文：Digital freight firm Sennder has agreed to buy the European logistics operations of its U.S. rival C.H. Robinson in a deal set to double its revenue to 1.4 billion euros ($1.5 billion), the German company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉因引擎盖问题召回180多万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周二表示，由于存在软件无法检测未锁定发动机罩的风险，特斯拉将在美国召回180多万辆汽车。【原文：Tesla is recalling over 1.8 million vehicles in the United States due to risk of software failure to detect unlatched hood, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国证券监管机构可能提拔执法总监为副主席
item.description: 四位消息人士称，中国证券监管机构很可能将其执法部门负责人提升为副主席，此举凸显了中国政府加强对 37 万亿元人民币（5.1 万亿美元）股票市场监管的决心。【原文：China's securities regulator is likely to promote its head of law enforcement to the role of vice chairman, four sources said, a move that underscores Beijing's determination to tighten oversight of the 37 trillion yuan ($5.1 trillion) stock market.】

item.title: 广告集团 WPP 任命英国电信前老板菲利普-詹森为新主席
item.description: WPP 周二任命英国电信前总裁菲利普-詹森（Philip Jansen）为新主席，接替罗伯托-夸塔（Roberto Quarta）成为全球最大的广告公司主席。【原文：WPP named former BT chief Philip Jansen as its new chair on Tuesday, succeeding Roberto Quarta at the world's largest advertising company.】
